div.p: Use this operation to retrieve variants with precise endpoints from a specified genomic region for a specified patient. If the range in question has been studied, the operation returns a FHIR Genomics report (that may or may not contain any variants). If the patient or the specified region has not been studied, the operation returns a 404 error.

ul.li: Region of interest is specified as a 0-based interval range of integers. Variants that overlap the range (variants 1-5 in the picture) would be returned, as would a point mutation at position x, but not a point mutation at position y. (Note that an insertion that starts before x, regardless of length, would not overlap x..y, and would therefore not be returned).
Genomic reference sequence is a valid NCBI chromosome-level ('NC_') build 37 or build 38 identifier, or a valid mitochondrion identifier (NC_012920.1, NC_001807.4).

Returned diagnostic report contains a single region studied profile, which reflects back the query parameters; zero to many variants found in the region; and zero to many sequence phase relationships between found variants. If the region hasn't been studied, return a 404 response code.
Diagnostic report must be returned as a bundle, with the following constraints. Additional information may optionally be included in the report.

1..1 Bundle
1…1 type = ‘collection’
1…1 Diagnostic Report
1…1 id
1…1 meta
1…1 profile = ‘http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition/genomics-report'
1…1 status = ‘final’
1…1 category = ‘GE’
1…1 code = ‘81247-9|Master HL7 genetic variant reporting panel’
1…1 subject
1…1 issued
1…1 result:region-studied
0…* result:variant
0…* result:sequence phase relation
1…1 Observation (RegionStudied)
1…1 id
1…1 meta
1…1 profile = ‘http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition/region-studied’
1…1 status = ‘final’
1…1 category = ‘laboratory’
1…1 code
1…1 subject
1…1 component:ranges-examined
1…1 component:coordinate-system = ‘0-based interval counting’
1…1 component:genomic-ref-seq
0…* Observation (variant)
1…1 id
1…1 meta
1…1 profile = ‘http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition/variant’
1…1 status = ‘final’
1…1 category = ‘laboratory’
1…1 code
1…1 subject
1…1 valueCodeableConcept
1…1 component:genomic-source-class
1…1 component:genomic-ref-seq
1…1 component:allelic-state
1…1 component:ref-allele
1…1 component:alt-allele
1…1 component:coordinate-system = ‘0-based interval counting’
1…1 component:exact-start-end
0…* Observation (sequence phase relationship)
1…1 id
1…1 meta
1…1 profile = ‘http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition/sequence-phase-relationship’
1…1 status = ‘final’
1…1 category = ‘laboratory’
1…1 code
1…1 subject
1…1 valueCodeableConcept
2…2 derivedFrom:variant
